You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20, and gain Proficiency in that Ability's Saving Throws.

Resilient is a Feat in Baldur's Gate 3. Feats are special talents or expertises that provide special capabilities to characters. At certain levels, your character will get to choose between an Ability Score Improvement Feature or a Feat.

BG3 Resilient Information

You increase an Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20, and gain Proficiency in that Ability's Saving Throws. Select 1 Feat Passive: Resilient: Strength Resilient: Dexterity Resilient: Constitution Resilient: Intelligence Resilient: Wisdom Resilient: Charisma

Resilient: Strength Resilient: Dexterity Resilient: Constitution Resilient: Intelligence Resilient: Wisdom Resilient: Charisma

How to unlock Resilient in BG3

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Resilient

All Classes at Level 4

BG3 Resilient Tips & Notes

Make sure you choose a Saving Throw you're not already proficient in as it won't stack. When your Constitution is an odd number (11-13-15-17 etc.), especially as a Caster, and you need a bonus for your Concentration checks, you can consider getting Resilient (Constitution) to get +4 Bonus to your Concentration (+ all other Constitution) checks + Hit Points equal to your level. Keep in mind that you are not already Proficient in Constitution for this to work. Barbarian, Fighter, and Sorcerer already start with proficiency in Constitution Saving Throws. Notes & Tips go here
